titles.title: Celebrating 140 years of diplomatic relations between the United States and Romania.
Celebrating 140 years of diplomatic relations between the United States and Romania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates the 140th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and Romania; supports Romania's pursuit of democratic, political, social, and economic progress; and reaffirms and supports the U.S.-Romanian relationship, including the strategic partnership between the nations.
